about.details:
Incorporated in 2019, Identical Brains Studios Limited offers computer-generated visual effects ("VFX") services. The company provides VFX services for projects such as films, web series, TV series, documentaries, and commercials.

The company has provided VFX services for films that received two Filmfare OTT Awards nominations, one Filmfare Awards nomination, one Dadasaheb Phalke Awards nomination and more for Best Visual Effects.

The company has also won two Filmfare OTT Awards for Best Visual Effects for Scam 1992: The Harshad Mehta Story (2020) and Rocket Boys (2022) in association with Variate Studios LLP and one Dadasaheb Phalke Awards for Phone Bhoot (2022) for Best Visual Effect.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Operations in economically attractive locations.
  • Integrated technology and infrastructure.
  • Skilled creative and technical workforce.
  • Reputation as a trusted provider of VFX Services with established relationships throughout the Entertainment Industry.
  • Attractive business model, with significant revenue visibility and compelling opportunities for long-term margin expansion and cash flow generation.
  • Experienced management team with managerial, creative and technical expertise and industry relationships.

faqs.question: What is the Identical Brains Studios IPO?
faqs.answer:
Identical Brains Studios IPO is a SME IPO of 3694000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹19.95 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹54 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on December 18, 2024, and closes on December 20, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Identical Brains Studios IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Identical Brains Studios IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Identical Brains Studios IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Identical Brains Studios IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Identical Brains Studios IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Identical Brains Studios IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Identical Brains Studios IPO opens on December 18, 2024 and closes on December 20, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Identical Brains Studios IPO?
faqs.answer: Identical Brains Studios IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Identical Brains Studios IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Identical Brains Studios IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Identical Brains Studios IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Identical Brains Studios IPO will be done on Monday, December 23, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, December 24, 2024. Check the Identical Brains Studios IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Identical Brains Studios IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Identical Brains Studios IPO listing date is on Thursday, December 26, 2024.
